participant_1.background:
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i like to go fishing.
this season , i will become a playoff quarterback.
My mother is in the hospital and I'm reading 1984 to distract myself from the pain.
I spend my weekends training for triathlons and dreaming about travelling.

participant_2.background:
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.
my favorite music is country.
My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend!
I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
My pets are my best friends and they make me laugh every day.

content.text: I'm so sorry to hear about your mom. I'm hoping for a quick recovery.
Thank you, I appreciate that.
What's your favorite hobby?
I love writing! I'm currently working on a book.
That's so cool! What's it about?
It's a romance novel set in the 1950s.
That sounds really interesting!
Thanks! I'm excited to finish it.
I hope you can finish it soon! What's your favorite part about writing?
I love being able to create my own world and characters.
That sounds like a lot of fun! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs and a cat.
Aww, that's so sweet! I love animals.
Me too! They're my best friends.
I'm sure they make you laugh every day.
They do! I love them so much.
I'm glad you have such a great family and pets to support you.
Thank you, I am too.
I hope your mom gets better soon!
Thank you! I hope so too.
